erlref.modulesummary: Handles the startup of all other processes This is the central part of the application.

description.p:
Handles the startup of all other processes This is the central part of the application. During a test run the primary responsibility is to start the runners and then give them the files to be ran.
The vm that starts this will be halted when the tests are finished or the user kills it

func.name: start() -> term()
func.fsummary: Starts the logger, reporter, and node preparation processes.

desc.p: Starts the logger, reporter, and node preparation processes
